title: LF TOP and ADC for Permanent Team for Clash / Weekly Tournies
body:
Hello,

My name is **Primal**. I have been participating in Amateur Competitive since season 7.
Currently looking to make a new team that is looking to play Clash and also play in weekly Plat - Challenger tournaments.

So far JG, Mid and Support Roles are filled.
Currently looking for a Top and ADC Plat 3+.

Requirements:
 - Decent Mental or Willing to work on their Mental stability.
 - Willing to learn and adapt to the team atmosphere.
 - Previous team experience is ideal but not necesarry.
 - Able to play most evenings during the week, and most of the weekend for clash etc.
 - Respectful and able to show responsibility by meeting team commitments (e.g. showing up for scrims/tournies in the meantime)

If interested for either of these roles, PM me on discord: Primal#7722.
Give me a small introduction of yourself and op.gg if available.

Kind Regards,

_**Primal**_
